summary:
Four mighty weapons. One deadly Dungeon full of Traps.
Will you be able to avoid the traps, to survive and to find the weapons?
descriptionHtml:
This PlugIn adds a new Dungeon, containing four Swords near Whiterun.
But it won\'t be easy for you to get them. They are protected through 
ancient mechanisms of deadly Traps.
If you are careless you might die sooner than you want...

If you are brave enough to take the risk, i give you the advice not to forget 
to save from time to time...


______________Update v2.0_________________
- One new Sword added: Zerk!
- A completely new Dungeon Part for the new Sword!
- Dungeon is much darker now
- Overall dangerousness incresed
- Fixed some minor bugs
- You cant travel from there anymore

Dont miss this Update!



Installation:
- Unpack the file with 7zip for example
- Put the .esp in your Skyrim Data folder
- Put the folder meshes in the data folder
- Put the folder textures in the data folder

Location:
See picture

How to get out:
Door at the end of the Dungeon

Review of my Mod made by Saiodin (It shows all the trap locations, only watch completely if you dont mind getting spoilered about that):
[code][youtube]5NTxpqxhhoo[/youtube][/code]

Bugs:
- No known so far

Compatibility problems with other mods:
- There might be problems if mods change the same area, where i placed the entrance. You can see the location in the image section. Mods that alter the game textures for example arent effected by this.
author: Anubis22
